{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::6154902df9d6676d327c4ad7::linkedin_ke", "source": "linkedin_ke", "country": "KE", "company": "AIfluence Inc.", "position": "Client Success Manager", "notes": "", "original": "

CLIENT SUCCESS MANAGER  


AIfluence is Africa\u2019s 1st Influencer Marketing Platform that\u2019s driven by artificial intelligence. We present a paradigm shift in the African Market and beyond, where you will be at the cutting edge of innovation in this industry. We are the fastest growing and best-in-class at what we do and we are taking the lead in shaping the future of advertising in Africa and beyond. We\u2019re a great place to work and pride ourselves in our unique culture. Join a company that values passion, innovation, authenticity, generosity, inclusivity, respect, teamwork, performance and loads of FUN!!. Due to our rapid growth, there is an inherent need to expand our existing Rockstar team to continue meeting and surpassing the needs of our rapidly growing client base. 


Summary of the Position: 

As the Client Success Manager (CSM), you will leverage the power of the AIfluence platform and own creator campaigns from start to finish, including sourcing, vetting, managing, and all related logistics. You will be responsible for executing custom and standardized programs in support of client campaigns across Africa. You will directly contribute to revenue, driving opportunities, and client retention KPIs. Reporting into a Lead Client Success Manager, you will leverage your expertise in social media trends and diverse audience expectations to meet client goals and grow our community of influencers. This is a critical role in a fast-growing team that will support our global expansion. Successful candidates will leverage their subject area expertise to provide data-based recommendations and flawless execution. 


Duties & Responsibilities: 

  • Project management, including campaign planning and analysis, budget management, stakeholder management, communication planning, performance tracking, and documentation. 
  •  Recruit and manage nano and micro-influencers identified by our platform across a variety of campaign types and social media platforms. 
  • Participate in thought leadership strategy sessions to identify areas for improvement at all stages of the creator lifecycle. 
  •  Team management; guiding Creator Success Officers towards exceeding campaign KPIs/goals
  • Design and run marketing AB tests to improve marketing campaigns 
  • Execute effective influencer programs on a performance basis, to strategically maximize value creation for clients, and to grow each client quarter over quarter
  •  Instruct, review and guide creator content through approvals and execution. 
  • Collaborate with internal teams (business development, finance, legal) and clients on campaigns, including supporting pitches, navigating fulfillment logistics, and performance reporting. 
  • Working with other members of the team, you will also analyze and report on each brand, optimizing over time for growth and efficiency 
  • Create monthly, quarterly and annual revenue and influencer cost reports and forecasts for performance-based campaigns, with an emphasis on realistic projections, over-performance, and managing appropriate expectations 
  • Take responsibility and accountability for assigned campaigns, managing all communication and tasks, occasionally outside of normal business hours 
  • Review videos, images, and other media to ensure complete accuracy and fulfillment of contractual obligations 
  • Other duties as assigned


Who you are

You have a burning desire to change the marketing and advertising landscape. To do so, you will need to have a track record in a few major areas of responsibility; data and trend analysis, collaboratively and frequently working with people, and most importantly creative problem-solving. You will need to be astute at generating data-driven insights in order to suggest strategic changes to campaigns and influencer content, ultimately driving profitability for the brand represented. You will always be working with other people, internally and externally, so enjoying a collaborative and personable environment is key. Our work is both complex and fluid in nature, so being able to creatively approach a problem and propose innovative solutions is critical. You pay extreme attention to detail with relentlessly high standards and have an innate willingness to roll up your sleeves and get the job done!


  •  Bachelor\u2019s Degree required 
  • 4+ years experience with digital marketing campaigns, media buying/planning, or other influencer-based marketing in Blue chip digital marketing departments and/or leading ad agencies 
  • An understanding of social media metrics, conversion funnels, and the ability to link results with specific elements of a broader campaign 
  • Exceptional presentation, written and verbal communication skills 
  • Experience with data-driven analysis (in Excel or other tools e.g. Power BI, Tableau etc) 
  • Demonstrable capability of self-direction and motivation \u2013 you will have a lot of freedom to make decisions, run tests, and drive the team forward. 
  • Experience in creative development and coordination of digital media campaigns across our core verticals (Banking, FMCG, and Telcos) will be advantageous 
  • Ability to deliver under pressure on time-sensitive assignments 
  • Fluent in English and Arabic or French (i.e. English plus French or English plus Arabic or English plus both Arabic and French)
  • Positive attitude, great sense of humor, enthusiastic, proactive, and driven 
  • Creative thinker with an entrepreneurial spirit, can-do attitude, and strong implementation ability 
  • Excellent project management, interpersonal and organizational skills 
  • Highly motivated, resourceful problem-solver with the ability to lead and interact effectively with cross-functional teams 
  • Photography/video production and/or experience with the Adobe creative suite is an advantage 
  • Experienced in the Google suite & Microsoft Office suite of applications 


An attractive remuneration and benefits package will be offered to the successful candidates. 


Location: Kenya 


Applications will be processed on a rolling basis


AIfluence is an equal opportunity employer
